name: tm59
effect: Teaches Dragon Pulse to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Incinerate to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Dragon Pulse)

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The foe is attacked with a shock
wave generated by the user’s gaping
mouth.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The foe is attacked with a shock
wave generated by the user’s gaping
mouth.
flavor_text_entries.heartgold-soulsilver:
The foe is attacked with a shock
wave generated by the user’s gaping
mouth.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks the target with fire.
If the target is holding a Berry, the
Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks the target with fire.
If the target is holding a Berry, the
Berry becomes burnt up and unusable.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire.
If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a
Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user swings its body around violently to inflict
damage on everything in its vicinity.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user swings its body around violently to inflict
damage on everything in its vicinity.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It
absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
The user flings its held item at the target to attack.
This move’s power and effects depend on the item.
